messages.agent_message: I can also create a new account for you. Would you like to do that today?
What account type would you like to create?
messages.user_message: I want to create a college fund account.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Please specify the account you want to select.
A college fund account was successfully created with starter funds transferred from savings.
Would you like to e-transfer any money to your contacts?
Ok. How much money do you want to send and to who?
Which account would you like to use?
messages.user_message: I want to use chequing for this.

messages.agent_message: You have a few outstanding bills. Would you like to pay them off now?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: I want to pay off my gas payment.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to select for this task?
Ok, I'm paying your gas bill from your savings account.
Are you expecting funds from any of your contacts?
Ok! I won't request money from any of your contacts today.
Would you like to transfer any money today?
Ok! Please specify the funds you which to transfer and the accounts to transfer between.
messages.user_message: I want to send 5000 to retirement fund from savings.

messages.agent_message: Transferring 5000 from savings to retirement fund...
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
